sentences.sContent: the oppressive heat of the afternoon

synos.tran: 压迫的；沉重的；压制性的；难以忍受的

remMethod.val: op + press(压) + ive → 压迫的， 压制的

words.tran: 压抑；镇压；压迫手段；沉闷；苦恼
压迫，压抑；使……烦恼；使……感到沉重

trans.tranCn: 压迫的， 压制的； 令人焦虑的
trans.tranOther: weather that is oppressive is unpleasantly hot with no movement of air
